name: Discover (Gundulf)
description:
Jam Team: Radical Reality

Introduction: Paint the board with your paintball gun that has infinite ammo, choose any color you want to paint with and discover yourself through the art you create

Also you can save it as PNG file

To see screenshots(Arts you created):

  • Windows: Open Discover folder and follow this direction: ”discover_Data\ScreenShots\”
  • Mac: Right click Discover.app, Click Show Package Contents and open ScreenShots folder

Credits: 

Gun - https://www.turbosquid.com/Search/Artists/Banism24

Color Picker - https://www.github.com/judah4/HSV-Color-Picker-Unity

Crosshair - https://s-a-t-u-r-n.itch.io/

Key - https://gerald-burke.itch.io/

Download Alternatives:

  • Windows: https://bit.ly/discoverWindows
  • Mac: https://bit.ly/discoverMAC
